attributes.action: Turn off street lighting between 02:00hrs and 05:00hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Turn off street lighting between 02:00hrs and 05:00hrs in residential areas and between 23:00hrs and 06:00hrs in non-residential areas when road and pedestrian traffic is at a minimum.  This will reduce costs and reduce CO2 emissions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
